name: Flapping Bird
description:
Flapping Bird is an addictive game, simple yet challenging.

Features:
- touch to flap the wings and fly between columns to score.
- Easy and fun to play.
- Click shopping to get free coins and buy more birds to reach higher score.
- Option to remove ads inside shopping.
- Unlock various achievements after completing the missions.
- Reach the TOP of Leaderboard to compete with friends.
- Share with friends by email, Facebook, message …
- Visit my app store to get more games.
